title: DDT
description:
A collection of one shots from 1981 to 1983.

My Youth
Apparition
The Proletarians' Secret Playtime
Celluloid Made in America- A little girl get molested
Vampire- A series of serial killings have happened.
DDT for a Rotten War
Impotent Boyfriends Since the Beginning- A girl's boyfriend has died. What does she do to him?

Impotent Boyfriends Since the Beginning 2

Female Hell-A girl thinks she might be in love with her girl friend, then she falls in love with a man who tries to rape her.

The Stinkiest Game-Worms, and a girl in the bathroom.

Messenger of the Moon- A man and a woman with masks on their faces are going at it when a customer comes in. Maruo has apparently put himself in the oneshot also. This one has worms too.

The Miraculous Man- A young blind girl and a woman who mistreats her. Then the woman gets mistreated by the blind girl and a friend. Scat.

My Name is Shit- Crossdressers, prostitutes, and worms.Apparently they try to castrate a boy.
